Package ex1

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    WebPageFilter
    interface of WebPageFilter
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompositWebPageFilter
    This class implements WebPageFilter and can includes two implementations of this: English filter and Javascript filter.
    EnglishDocumentsFilter
    This class implements WebPageFilter and blockes all sites if these languages not English
    HTMLTagRemover
    needs to be tested on latest JDK!
    ReadFromFile
    Open and read a file, and return the lines in the file as a list of Strings.
    RejectJavaScriptFilter
    Filter for web-sites: blocks sites with java-script code inside
    RestrictedView
    Main class for starting the program.
    WebPageFilterFactory
    The class for creating class of filter.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NoSuchFilterException
    Exception: a user submitted name of filter that does not exist
